description:
The nominees for the 59th Grammy Awards were announced this morning (Dec. 6), with last year's Best New Artist winner Meghan Trainor unveiling the contestants for the marquee categories live on CBS. The field is led by Beyoncéwith 9 nominations, followed by similarly huge stars Drake, Rihanna andKanye West (8 each).第59届格莱美提名于（北美时间）12月6日上午揭晓，去年最佳新人得主梅根•特瑞娜在CBS电视直播中宣读多个奖项的竞争人选。碧昂丝以9项提名领跑，德雷克、蕾哈娜和坎爷都获得8个提名紧随其后。

But of course, with 84 categories in all, the Grammys are always about far more than just the biggest names. Here,Billboard presents the complete list of nominees for music's biggest night, to take place on February 12, 2017.格莱美奖设有84个种类，是全球最隆重最权威的音乐盛事。一年一度的颁奖典礼已经进入第59个年头，2017年的格莱美将在北美时间2月12日举行。

GENERAL FIELD综合制作类


Album Of The Year 年度专辑
25 — Adele 阿黛尔
Lemonade — Beyoncé 碧昂丝
Purpose — Justin Bieber 贾斯汀•比伯
Views — Drake 德雷克
A Sailor's Guide To Earth — Sturgill Simpson 斯特吉尔•辛普森


Record Of The Year 年度制作
"Hello" — Adele 阿黛尔
"Formation" — Beyoncé 碧昂丝
"7 Years" — Lukas Graham 卢卡斯•葛拉汉
"Work" — Rihanna Featuring Drake 蕾哈娜与德雷克联合之作
"Stressed Out" — Twenty One Pilots 二十一名飞行员


Song Of The Year 年度歌曲
"Formation" — Khalif Brown, Asheton Hogan, Beyoncé Knowles & Michael L. Williams II, songwriters (Beyoncé)  哈里发•布朗，阿什顿•霍根，碧昂丝和迈克尔•威廉，词曲作者（碧昂丝）
"Hello" — Adele Adkins & Greg Kurstin, songwriters (Adele)  阿黛尔•阿德金斯和格雷格•克尔斯汀，词曲作者（阿黛尔）
"I Took A Pill In Ibiza" — Mike Posner, songwriter (Mike Posner)  麦克•波斯纳 词曲作者（麦克•波斯纳）
"Love Yourself" — Justin Bieber, Benjamin Levin & Ed Sheeran, songwriters (Justin Bieber)  贾斯汀•比伯，本杰明•莱文和艾德•希兰，词曲作者（贾斯汀•比伯）
"7 Years" — Lukas Forchhammer, Stefan Forrest, Morten Pilegaard & Morten Ristorp, songwriters (Lukas Graham)  卢卡斯•福希哈默尔


POP FIELD流行类


Best Pop Vocal Album 最佳流行专辑
25 — Adele 阿黛尔
Purpose — Justin Bieber 贾斯汀•比伯
Dangerous Woman — Ariana Grande 爱莉安娜•格兰德
Confident — Demi Lovato 黛米•洛瓦特
This Is Acting — Sia 希雅
Best Pop Solo Performance 最佳流行歌手


"Hello" — Adele 阿黛尔
"Hold Up" — Beyonce 碧昂丝
"Love Yourself" — Justin Bieber 贾斯汀•比伯
"Piece By Piece (Idol Version)" — Kelly Clarkson 凯莉•克莱森
"Dangerous Woman" — Ariana Grande  爱莉安娜•格兰德

Best New Artist 最佳新人
Kelsea Ballerini
The Chainsmokers
Chance The Rapper
Maren Morris
Anderson .Paak


Best Pop Duo/Group Performance 最佳流行团体/组合表演
"Closer" — The Chainsmokers Featuring Halsey
"7 Years" — Lukas Graham
"Work" — Rihanna Featuring Drake
"Cheap Thrills" — Sia Featuring Sean Paul
"Stressed Out" — Twenty One Pilots


Best Traditional Pop Vocal Album 最佳传统流行专辑
Cinema — Andrea Bocelli
Fallen Angels — Bob Dylan
Stages Live — Josh Groban
Summertime: Willie Nelson Sings Gershwin — Willie Nelson
Encore: Movie Partners Sing Broadway — Barbra Streisand


DANCE/ELECTRONIC MUSIC FIELD 舞蹈/电子音乐类


Best Dance Recording 最佳舞曲制作
"Tearing Me Up" — Bob Moses
"Don't Let Me Down" — The Chainsmokers Featuring Daya
"Never Be Like You" — Flume Featuring Kai
"Rinse & Repeat" — Riton Featuring Kah-Lo
"Drinkee" — Sofi Tukker


Best Dance/Electronic Album 最佳舞曲/电子专辑
Skin — Flume
Electronica 1: The Time Machine — Jean-Michel Jarre
Epoch — Tycho
Barbara Barbara, We Face A Shining Future — Underworld
Louie Vega Starring…XXVIII — Louie Vega

  • （南瓜姐姐背单词）Serve变形记

  • 睡不着？那你的饮食习惯很有可能有问题！
  • 10个最有效的学习方法，你都掌握了吗？

title: 59届格莱美提名名单 碧昂斯9项提名领跑创纪录
